de.spricom.dessert.slicing

Class Root

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.AbstractSlice
      • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.AbstractRootSlice
        • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.Root
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Slice

    public class Root
extends AbstractRootSlice
    A special Slice that represents a whole JAR file, classes directory, module or other single source of classes. The slice contains all its .class files.
